Perceptor:

"BE careful, doyou know who will do all the repairs?"


From: P=
reston Carroll 
Sent: Wednesday, February 24, 2010 3:26 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com 
Subject: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortress


  
> "Gotta - m=
ake it outa here no matter what. Wheels needs me, I can't just drop 'em lik=
e a pile of scrap, I can't. He's probably the only friend I got other than =
my comrades. And besides, he's leader material, and if anyone can give glor=
y back ta the Autobots, it's him. Forget about Rodimus steppn' up ta the pl=
ate, he's far too gone now. And I wonder, I wonder what would happen if Tuc=
son was able ta break the hold on Roddie, what will everyone think of him o=
nce he came clean again? I sure know what I'd think.. I'd think he's yester=
day's news. Trust him again, yeah, right, over my dead aft I'll trust that =
guy again. Fancy paint job or no fancy paint job, he ain't no Optimus Prime=
 like Wheels."
>
> Thought Rat Trap as he quietly and slowly makes his way =
through the vent pipes of the base.

Scourge slowly walked down the corrido=
r nearest to Rat Trap's
position, the small cannon mount on his head extend=
ing a red beam that
played itself along the wall. "I sense you Ratling." Sc=
ourge hissed in
low tones. "You are behind the walls, cowering where you th=
ink we
can't get you." His voice is deep and soft, almost as if he were
tal=
king more to himself then to Rat Trap - and perhaps he was. He
snickered qu=
ietly.

Cyclonus followed Scourge a few steps back, allowing his more adept=

tracker take the point on this one. For his own sake he kept his
optics on=
 full, watching the walls and cieling as well as the floor
ahead, you never=
 know where the next Maximal would appear - they
seemed to be jumping out o=
f the very walls today.

Scourge suddenly came to a stop as he looked at a =
section of wall, one
that to the casual observer didn't look any different =
than any other,
but for him it brought a smile. He glanced back at Percepto=
r and
Cyclonus and then back at the wall. He oriented his rifle at the wall=
,
and with a precisely targeted disintegration blast, fired at Rat
Trap's p=
osition through the wall!

OOc: Scourge is being careful to target only Rat=
 Trap, and not
anything important like circuitry! :)

(TAG)

Preston
(Cyclo=
nus/Scourge)
